TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CharUnicodeInfo extends System.Object
public ref class CharUnicodeInfo abstract sealed

summary.span: Retrieves information about a Unicode character.

span.span: Retrieves information about a Unicode character.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義幾個 Unicode 字元分類。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a number of Unicode character categories. 例如，字元可能會分類為大寫字母、 小寫字母、 十進位數字、 字母數字、 段落分隔符號、 數學符號或貨幣符號。For example, a character might be categorized as an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a decimal digit number, a letter number, a paragraph separator, a math symbol, or a currency symbol. 您的應用程式可以使用來管理字串為基礎的作業，例如剖析或擷取使用規則運算式的子字串的字元類別目錄。Your application can use the character category to govern string-based operations, such as parsing or extracting substring with regular expressions. 列舉型別定義的可能字元類別。The enumeration defines the possible character categories. 您使用類別來取得特定字元的值。You use the class to obtain the value for a specific character. 類別會定義傳回下列 Unicode 字元值的方法：The class defines methods that return the following Unicode character values: - 字元或 surrogate 字組所屬的特定類別目錄。The specific category to which a character or surrogate pair belongs. 傳回的值屬於列舉型別。The value returned is a member of the enumeration. - 數值。Numeric value. 僅適用於數字字元，包括分數、 註標、 上標、 羅馬數字、 貨幣分子環狀數字和指令碼特定數字。Applies only to numeric characters, including fractions, subscripts, superscripts, Roman numerals, currency numerators, encircled numbers, and script-specific digits. - 數字值。Digit value. 適用於可以結合其他字元來表示整個數字系統中的數字字元。Applies to numeric characters that can be combined with other numeric characters to represent a whole number in a numbering system. - 十進位數字值。Decimal digit value. 僅適用於表示十進位 (基底 10) 系統中的十進位數字的字元。Applies only to characters that represent decimal digits in the decimal (base 10) system. 十進位數字可以是下列其中一個十位數，從 0 到 9。A decimal digit can be one of ten digits, from zero through nine. 成員，這些字元出現類別目錄。These characters are members of the category. 此外，類別可由數項其他.NET Framework 類型和方法，依賴字元分類在內部使用。In addition, the class is used internally by a number of other .NET Framework types and methods that rely on character classification. 它們包括：These include: - 類別，會使用而不是單一字元字串中的文字項目。The class, which works with textual elements instead of single characters in a string. - 多載方法，這個方法會判斷字元或 surrogate 字組所屬的類別目錄。The overloads of the method, which determine the category to which a character or surrogate pair belongs. - [字元類別](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-classes-in-regular-expressions.md)辨識，.NET Framework 規則運算式引擎。The [character classes](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-classes-in-regular-expressions.md) recognized by , the .NET Framework's regular expression engine. 時在應用程式中使用這個類別，請記住下列程式設計考量使用型別。When using this class in your applications, keep in mind the following programming considerations for using the type. 類型很難使用，以及字串比較適合使用通常用於表示語言的內容。The type can be difficult to use, and strings are generally preferable for representing linguistic content. - A物件不一定對應至單一字元。A object does not always correspond to a single character. 雖然類型代表單一的 16 位元值，某些字元 （例如語素簇和 surrogate 字組） 包含兩個或多個 utf-16 字碼單位。Although the type represents a single 16-bit value, some characters (such as grapheme clusters and surrogate pairs) consist of two or more UTF-16 code units. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 Char 物件和 Unicode 字元 」類別。For more information, see "Char Objects and Unicode Characters" in the class. - 也有彈性的"character"的概念。The notion of a "character" is also flexible. 字元通常視為圖像，但多圖像需要多個字碼指標。A character is often thought of as a glyph, but many glyphs require multiple code points. 比方說，ä 可以是表示由兩個字碼指標 （"a"加上 U + 0308，也就是結合 diaeresis），或由的單一程式碼點 （"ä 」 或 U + 00A4）。For example, ä can be represented either by two code points ("a" plus U+0308, which is the combining diaeresis), or by a single code point ("ä" or U+00A4). 某些語言具有許多字母、 字元，以及需要多個字碼指標，會造成混淆語言內容的表示法中的圖像。Some languages have many letters, characters, and glyphs that require multiple code points, which can cause confusion in linguistic content representation. 例如，沒有 ΰ （U + 03B0、 希臘文的小寫字母二十個太空站 dialytika 與 tonos），但沒有對等大寫的字母。For example, there is a ΰ (U+03B0, Greek small letter upsilon with dialytika and tonos), but there is no equivalent capital letter. 寫這類值時，只會擷取原始的值。Uppercasing such a value simply retrieves the original value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示每個不同類型的字元方法所傳回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CPP/charunicodeinfo_char.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CS/charunicodeinfo_char.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/VB/charunicodeinfo_char.vb#1)]

span.para:
可辨識的字元和其所屬的特定類別 Unicode 標準所定義，而且可以從一個版本的 Unicode 標準將變更為另一個。特定版本的.NET Framework 中的字元分類根據單一 Unicode 標準，無論基礎.NET Framework 執行所在的作業系統版本。下表列出自.NET Framework 版本為 [！INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 和用於字元分類的 Unicode 標準版本。 .NET framework 版本 Unicode 標準版本
[！INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] [Unicode 標準，版本 5.0.0] (https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode5.0.0/)
[！INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] [Unicode 標準，版本 5.0.0] (https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode5.0.0/)
[！INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)] [Unicode 標準，版本 5.0.0] (https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode5.0.0/)
[！INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] [Unicode 標準，版本 5.0.0] (https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode5.0.0/)
[！INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] [Unicode 標準，版本 6.3.0] (https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/)
[！INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)] [Unicode 標準，版本 6.3.0] (https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/)
[！INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)] [Unicode Standard，版本 8.0.0] (https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0/) Unicode 的每個版本標準包含自舊版以來對 Unicode 字元資料庫資訊。 使用 Unicode 字元資料庫類別分類的字元。

Recognized characters and the specific categories to which they belong are defined by the Unicode standard and can change from one version of the Unicode Standard to another. Categorization of characters in a particular version of the .NET Framework is based on a single version of the Unicode Standard regardless of the underlying operating system on which the .NET Framework is running. The following table lists versions of the .NET Framework since the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and the versions of the Unicode Standard used to classify characters. .NET Framework version Version of the Unicode Standard
[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] [The Unicode Standard, Version 5.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode5.0.0/)
[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] [The Unicode Standard, Version 5.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode5.0.0/)
[!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)] [The Unicode Standard, Version 5.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode5.0.0/)
[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] [The Unicode Standard, Version 5.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode5.0.0/)
[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] [The Unicode Standard, Version 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/)
[!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)] [The Unicode Standard, Version 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/)
[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)] [The Unicode Standard, Version 8.0.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0/) Each version of the Unicode standard includes information on changes to the Unicode character database since the previous version. The Unicode character database is used by the class for categorizing characters.

summary.span: Gets the decimal digit value of a numeric Unicode character.

span.span: Gets the decimal digit value of a numeric Unicode character.

span.span: -or- -1, if the specified character is not a decimal digit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將轉換成其對等的整數值代表小數位數的字元。This method converts characters that represent decimal digits to their equivalent integral values. 小數位數是個字元代表十位數十進位 (基底 10) 編號從 0 到 9 的系統，其中的類別。Decimal digits are characters in the category that can represent one of ten digits in the decimal (base 10) numbering system, from zero through nine. 它包含例如 U + 0030 （數字零） 到 U + 0039 (數字 9)，U + 0660 （阿拉伯數字零） 到 U + 0669 (阿拉伯數字 9)，U + 07c 0 （NKO 數字零） 到 U + 07C 9 (NKO 數字 9) 和 U + 1040 （緬甸數字零） 字元 （U + 1049年透過緬甸數字 9）。It includes characters such as U+0030 (DIGIT ZERO) through U+0039 (DIGIT NINE), U+0660 (ARABIC-INDIC DIGIT ZERO) through U+0669 (ARABIC-INDIC DIGIT NINE), U+07C0 (NKO DIGIT ZERO) through U+07C9 (NKO DIGIT NINE), and U+1040 (MYANMAR DIGIT ZERO) through U+1049 (MYANMAR DIGIT NINE). 如需 Unicode 字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information about Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示每個不同類型的字元方法所傳回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CPP/charunicodeinfo_char.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CS/charunicodeinfo_char.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/VB/charunicodeinfo_char.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將轉換成其對等的整數值代表小數位數的字元。This method converts characters that represent decimal digits to their equivalent integral values. 小數位數是個字元代表十位數十進位 (基底 10) 編號從 0 到 9 的系統，其中的類別。Decimal digits are characters in the category that can represent one of ten digits in the decimal (base 10) numbering system, from zero through nine. 它包含例如 U + 0030 （數字零） 到 U + 0039 (數字 9)，U + 0660 （阿拉伯數字零） 到 U + 0669 (阿拉伯數字 9)，U + 07c 0 （NKO 數字零） 到 U + 07C 9 (NKO 數字 9) 和 U + 1040 （緬甸數字零） 字元 （U + 1049年透過緬甸數字 9）。It includes characters such as U+0030 (DIGIT ZERO) through U+0039 (DIGIT NINE), U+0660 (ARABIC-INDIC DIGIT ZERO) through U+0669 (ARABIC-INDIC DIGIT NINE), U+07C0 (NKO DIGIT ZERO) through U+07C9 (NKO DIGIT NINE), and U+1040 (MYANMAR DIGIT ZERO) through U+1049 (MYANMAR DIGIT NINE). 如需 Unicode 字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information about Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示每個不同類型的字元方法所傳回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/CPP/charunicodeinfo_string.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/CS/charunicodeinfo_string.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/VB/charunicodeinfo_string.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數字的值為僅適用於可用來當做數字的數字字元的屬性。Digit value is a property that applies only to numeric characters that can be used as digits. 數字是可以與其他數字，表示整個數字系統中結合數字字元。A digit is a numeric character that can be combined with other digits to represent a whole number in a numbering system. 如需 Unicode 字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information on Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示每個不同類型的字元方法所傳回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. remarks.format: ## Remarks 數值為僅適用於數字字元，包括分數、 註標、 上標、 羅馬數字、 貨幣分子環狀數字和指令碼特定數字的 Unicode 字元屬性。Numeric value is a Unicode character property that applies only to numeric characters, which include fractions, subscripts, superscripts, Roman numerals, currency numerators, encircled numbers, and script-specific digits. 如需 Unicode 字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information on Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). 方法會假設`ch`對應至單一語言的字元，並檢查該字元是否可以轉換成十進位數字。The method assumes that `ch` corresponds to a single linguistic character and checks whether that character can be converted to a decimal digit. 不過，某些 Unicode 標準中的數字都由兩個會組成 surrogate 字組的物件。However, some numbers in the Unicode standard are represented by two objects that form a surrogate pair. 例如，編號系統 Aegean 字碼指標 U + 10107 到 U + 10133 所組成。For example, the Aegean numbering system consists of code points U+10107 through U+10133. 下列範例會使用方法來具現化字串，代表 AEGEAN 的數字一。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents AEGEAN NUMBER ONE. 做為範例所示，從輸出方法會傳回-1，如果傳遞為高 surrogate 或低 surrogate 的此字元。As the output from the example shows, the method returns -1 if it is passed either a high surrogate or a low surrogate of this character. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetNumericValue#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getnumericvalue/cs/getnumericvalue1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetNumericValue#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getnumericvalue/vb/getnumericvalue1.vb#2)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示每個不同類型的字元方法所傳回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CPP/charunicodeinfo_char.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CS/charunicodeinfo_char.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/VB/charunicodeinfo_char.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static double GetNumericValue (string s, int index);
.method public static hidebysig float64 GetNumericValue(string s, int32 index) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetNumericValue (s As String, index As Integer) As Double
public: static double GetNumericValue(System::String ^ s, int index);
static member GetNumericValue : string * int -> double

param.name: s
param.span: The containing the Unicode character for which to get the numeric value.

span.span: The containing the Unicode character for which to get the numeric value.

param.name: index
param.span: The index of the Unicode character for which to get the numeric value.

span.span: The index of the Unicode character for which to get the numeric value.

summary.span: Gets the numeric value associated with the character at the specified index of the specified string.

span.span: Gets the numeric value associated with the character at the specified index of the specified string.

returns.span: The numeric value associated with the character at the specified index of the specified string.

span.span: The numeric value associated with the character at the specified index of the specified string.

returns.span: -or- -1, if the character at the specified index of the specified string is not a numeric character.

span.span: -or- -1, if the character at the specified index of the specified string is not a numeric character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數值為僅適用於數字字元，包括分數、 註標、 上標、 羅馬數字、 貨幣分子環狀數字和指令碼特定數字的 Unicode 字元屬性。Numeric value is a Unicode character property that applies only to numeric characters, which include fractions, subscripts, superscripts, Roman numerals, currency numerators, encircled numbers, and script-specific digits. 如需 Unicode 字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information on Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). 如果物件位置`index`是有效的 surrogate 字組，第一個字元方法會判斷 surrogate 字組數字，會形成，若是如此，傳回其數字的值。If the object at position `index` is the first character of a valid surrogate pair, the method determines whether the surrogate pair forms a numeric digit, and, if it does, returns its numeric value. 例如，編號系統 Aegean 字碼指標 U + 10107 到 U + 10133 所組成。For example, the Aegean numbering system consists of code points U+10107 through U+10133. 下列範例會使用方法來具現化，表示每個 Aegean 的數字的字串。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents each Aegean number. 做為範例所示，從輸出方法會傳回正確的數值，如果傳遞 Aegean 的數字的高 surrogate。As the output from the example shows, the method returns the correct numeric value if it is passed the high surrogate of an Aegean number. 不過，如果傳遞低 surrogate，它會考慮只在隔離之低 surrogate，傳回-1。However, if it is passed the low surrogate, it considers only the low surrogate in isolation and returns -1. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetNumericValue#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getnumericvalue/cs/getnumericvalue1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetNumericValue#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getnumericvalue/vb/getnumericvalue1.vb#3)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示每個不同類型的字元方法所傳回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/CPP/charunicodeinfo_string.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/CS/charunicodeinfo_string.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_String/VB/charunicodeinfo_string.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets the Unicode category of a Unicode character.

span.span: Gets the Unicode category of a Unicode character.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory GetUnicodeCategory (char ch);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory GetUnicodeCategory(char ch) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetUnicodeCategory (ch As Char) As UnicodeCategory
public: static System::Globalization::UnicodeCategory GetUnicodeCategory(char ch);
static member GetUnicodeCategory : char -> System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory

param.name: ch
param.span: The Unicode character for which to get the Unicode category.

span.span: The Unicode character for which to get the Unicode category.

summary.span: Gets the Unicode category of the specified character.

span.span: Gets the Unicode category of the specified character.

returns.span: A value indicating the category of the specified character.

span.span: A value indicating the category of the specified character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Unicode 字元分成類別。The Unicode characters are divided into categories. 字元分類是其中一個屬性。A character's category is one of its properties. 例如，字元可能是大寫字母、 小寫字母、 十進位數字、 字母數字、 連接子標點符號、 數學符號或貨幣符號。For example, a character might be an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a decimal digit number, a letter number, a connector punctuation, a math symbol, or a currency symbol. 類別會傳回 Unicode 字元分類。The class returns the category of a Unicode character. 如需 Unicode 字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information on Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). 方法會假設`ch`對應至單一語言的字元，並傳回其類別目錄。The method assumes that `ch` corresponds to a single linguistic character and returns its category. 這表示，對於 surrogate 字組，它會傳回而不是 surrogate 所屬的類別目錄。This means that, for surrogate pairs, it returns instead of the category to which the surrogate belongs. 例如，Ugaritic 字母佔據字碼指標 U + 10380 到 U + 1039F。For example, the Ugaritic alphabet occupies code points U+10380 to U+1039F. 下列範例會使用方法來具現化字串，代表 UGARITIC 字母 ALPA (U + 10380)，也就是 Ugaritic 字母的第一個字母。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents UGARITIC LETTER ALPA (U+10380), which is the first letter of the Ugaritic alphabet. 做為範例所示，從輸出方法會傳回`false`如果它傳遞之高 surrogate 或低 surrogate 的此字元。As the output from the example shows, the method returns `false` if it is passed either the high surrogate or the low surrogate of this character. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getunicodecategory/cs/getunicodecategory1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getunicodecategory/vb/getunicodecategory1.vb#1)] 請注意，不一定會傳回相同視為方法時做為參數傳遞特定的字元。Note that does not always return the same value as the method when passed a particular character as a parameter. 方法設計用來反映目前版本的 Unicode 標準。The method is designed to reflect the current version of the Unicode standard. 相反地，雖然方法通常會反映目前版本的 Unicode 標準，它可能會傳回字元的分類，根據舊版的標準，或它可能會從目前的標準，以傳回不同的類別目錄保持回溯相容性。In contrast, although the method usually reflects the current version of the Unicode standard, it might return a character's category based on a previous version of the standard, or it might return a category that differs from the current standard to preserve backward compatibility. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示每個不同類型的字元方法所傳回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CPP/charunicodeinfo_char.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/CS/charunicodeinfo_char.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo_Char/VB/charunicodeinfo_char.vb#1)]

span.span: A value indicating the category of the character at the specified index of the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Unicode 字元分成類別。The Unicode characters are divided into categories. 字元分類是其中一個屬性。A character's category is one of its properties. 例如，字元可能是大寫字母、 小寫字母、 十進位數字、 字母數字、 連接子標點符號、 數學符號或貨幣符號。For example, a character might be an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a decimal digit number, a letter number, a connector punctuation, a math symbol, or a currency symbol. 類別會傳回 Unicode 字元分類。The class returns the category of a Unicode character. 如需 Unicode 字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)。For more information on Unicode characters, see the [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123). 如果物件位置`index`是有效的 surrogate 字組，第一個字元方法會傳回 surrogate 字組，而不是傳回的 Unicode 分類。If the object at position `index` is the first character of a valid surrogate pair, the method returns the Unicode category of the surrogate pair instead of returning . 例如，Ugaritic 字母佔據字碼指標 U + 10380 到 U + 1039F。For example, the Ugaritic alphabet occupies code points U+10380 to U+1039F. 下列範例會使用方法來具現化字串，代表 UGARITIC 字母 ALPA (U + 10380)，也就是 Ugaritic 字母的第一個字母。The following example uses the method to instantiate a string that represents UGARITIC LETTER ALPA (U+10380), which is the first letter of the Ugaritic alphabet. 做為範例所示，從輸出方法會傳回如果它傳遞之高 surrogate 的字元，這表示它會考慮將 surrogate 字組。As the output from the example shows, the method returns if it is passed the high surrogate of this character, which indicates that it considers the surrogate pair. 不過，如果傳遞低 surrogate，它會考慮只在隔離之低 surrogate，並傳回。However, if it is passed the low surrogate, it considers only the low surrogate in isolation and returns . [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getunicodecategory/cs/getunicodecategory1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.charunicodeinfo.getunicodecategory/vb/getunicodecategory1.vb#2)] 請注意，方法不一定會傳回相同視為方法時做為參數傳遞特定的字元。Note that method does not always return the same value as the method when passed a particular character as a parameter. 方法設計用來反映目前版本的 Unicode 標準。The method is designed to reflect the current version of the Unicode standard. 相反地，雖然方法通常會反映目前版本的 Unicode 標準，它可能會傳回字元的分類，根據舊版的標準，或它可能會從目前的標準，以傳回不同的類別目錄保持回溯相容性。In contrast, although the method usually reflects the current version of the Unicode standard, it might return a character's category based on a previous version of the standard, or it might return a category that differs from the current standard to preserve backward compatibility. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示每個不同類型的字元方法所傳回的值。The following code example shows the values returned by each method for different types of characters.
